Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“......”{Line}1 этаж{Line}2 этаж
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“......”{Line}1F{Line}3F

Monologue.Current: “Привет. У тебя ведь{Line} сегодня экзамен, верно?”{Next}“А ты ещё не был{Line} в {Color Blue}〖Огненной пещере〗{Color White}, да?”{Next}“И ты так спокоен?”
Monologue.Original: “Hi.{Line} You have that{Line} SeeD exam today, right?”{Next}“And you still haven’t gone{Line} to the {Color Blue}〖Fire Cavern〗{Color White}?”{Next}“Are you just taking it easy?”

Monologue.Current: “Hello.{Line} Don’t you have that SeeD exam now?”{Next}“I guess you’re not too worried{Line} since you’re still hanging around here...”
Monologue.Original: “Hello.{Line} Don’t you have that SeeD exam now?”{Next}“I guess you’re not too worried{Line} since you’re still hanging around here...”

Monologue.Current: “Hey?{Line} I heard that your first mission’s coming up.”{Next}“And you’re still hanging out here...?{Line} I guess you’re not too worried...”
Monologue.Original: “Hey?{Line} I heard that your first mission’s coming up.”{Next}“And you’re still hanging out here...?{Line} I guess you’re not too worried...”

Monologue.Current: “What’s going on?{Line} I was hiding for a while, and{Line} now I see all this chaos.”{Next}“Man, I’m really scared.{Line} Obviously, you’re not, eh?”
Monologue.Original: “What’s going on?{Line} I was hiding for a while, and{Line} now I see all this chaos.”{Next}“Man, I’m really scared.{Line} Obviously, you’re not, eh?”

Monologue.Current: “I’m still a little shaken{Line} by what’s happening.”{Next}“You know, with the{Line} Garden flying and all.{Line} You’re looking mighty calm.”
Monologue.Original: “I’m still a little shaken{Line} by what’s happening.”{Next}“You know, with the{Line} Garden flying and all.{Line} You’re looking mighty calm.”

Monologue.Current: “How’s it going?”{Next}“So do you think you can{Line} finish this game?”
Monologue.Original: “How’s it going?”{Next}“So do you think you can{Line} finish this game?”

Monologue.Current: Ага.{Line}Чёрт его знает...
Monologue.Original: Yeah{Line}...I don’t know

Monologue.Current: “Hello.”
Monologue.Original: “Hello.”

Monologue.Current: “О!..{Line} (Уверен, как всегда...)”
Monologue.Original: “Oh...{Line} (Confident as always...)”

Monologue.Current: “О...{Line} Ну, будь осторожен...”
Monologue.Original: “Oh...{Line} Well, take care...”

Monologue.Current: “О, {Char Squall}!{Line} Мне тут брательник всучил карты,{Line} а они мне нафиг не сдались.{Line} Нужны?”
Monologue.Original: “Oh, hey, would you{Line} like to have these?”{Next}“My brother gave me these cards{Line} but they’re really not my thing.{Line} You can have them if you’d like.”

Monologue.Current: “Что?{Line} Ты не знаешь как играть?”{Next}“Ну, тут я тебе ничем не помогу.{Line} Загляни в {Color Yellow}руководство{Color White}.”
Monologue.Original: “What?{Line} How do you play a card game?”{Next}“Hmmm, I think it’d be best{Line} to look at the card game explanation{Line} in the Tutorial. I don’t know{Line} much about it, really.”

Monologue.Current: “Если захочешь с кем-нибудь сыграть,{Line} поговори с ним, нажав {Key Cards}.{Line} Но в карты играют не все.”
Monologue.Original: “If you want to play cards with{Line} someone, talk to them by pressing {Key Cards}. But{Line} keep in mind, not everyone is a card player.”

Monologue.Current: “Кстати, Я НЕ ИГРАЮ!”
Monologue.Original: “Oh, and by the way,{Line} I don’t play, so don’t{Line} bother challenging me.”

Monologue.Current: Member No. 109{Line}“Don’t cause{Line} too much trouble for{Line} Instructor Trepe.”
Monologue.Original: Member No. 109{Line}“Don’t cause{Line} too much trouble for{Line} Instructor Trepe.”

Monologue.Current: Member No. 109{Line}“Oh man...{Line} I don’t feel like{Line} going to class anymore.”
Monologue.Original: Member No. 109{Line}“Oh man...{Line} I don’t feel like{Line} going to class anymore.”

Monologue.Current: Member No.109{Line}“What the hell is this?{Line} Nobody told us that{Line} this thing can fly.”
Monologue.Original: Member No.109{Line}“What the hell is this?{Line} Nobody told us that{Line} this thing can fly.”

Monologue.Current: Member No. 109{Line}“Hello, instru...{Line} I mean, Miss Trepe.”{Next}“I’m rooting for you.{Line} You can count on me.”
Monologue.Original: Member No. 109{Line}“Hello, instru...{Line} I mean, Miss Trepe.”{Next}“I’m rooting for you.{Line} You can count on me.”

Monologue.Current: Member No. 109{Line}“Hey!{Line} It was kind of hairy for a while,{Line} but we’re all used to it now, huh?”
Monologue.Original: Member No. 109{Line}“Hey!{Line} It was kind of hairy for a while,{Line} but we’re all used to it now, huh?”

Monologue.Current: Member No. 109{Line}“Hey, good luck!{Line} We’re counting on you.”
Monologue.Original: Member No. 109{Line}“Hey, good luck!{Line} We’re counting on you.”

Monologue.Current: Member No. 109{Line}“Hey, someone gave me{Line} these cards.”{Next}“They’re kind of cool.{Line} Maybe I’ll start collecting, too.{Line} Wanna play me sometime?”
Monologue.Original: Member No. 109{Line}“Hey, someone gave me{Line} these cards.”{Next}“They’re kind of cool.{Line} Maybe I’ll start collecting, too.{Line} Wanna play me sometime?”

Monologue.Current: Selphie{Line}“SeeD!{Line} SeeeeD!{Line} SeeeeeeeD!”
Monologue.Original: Selphie{Line}“SeeD!{Line} SeeeeD!{Line} SeeeeeeeD!”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Yo!{Line} {Char Squall}!!{Line} Let’s get back to class.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Yo!{Line} {Char Squall}!!{Line} Let’s get back to class.”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“What do you mean, ‘why?’ Don’t you{Line} remember what new SeeD members do?”{Next}“They give a speech in front of the{Line} entire class! And after that,{Line} the inauguration party!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“What do you mean, ‘why?’ Don’t you{Line} remember what new SeeD members do?”{Next}“They give a speech in front of the{Line} entire class! And after that,{Line} the inauguration party!”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“OHHHHH YEAHHHHH!!!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“OHHHHH YEAHHHHH!!!”

Monologue.Current: “After 17 years of suffering,{Line} my chance has finally arrived!”
Monologue.Original: “After 17 years of suffering,{Line} my chance has finally arrived!”

Monologue.Current: “Oh!!!{Line} W-W-What, {Char Squall}?”
Monologue.Original: “Oh!!!{Line} W-W-What, {Char Squall}?”

Monologue.Current: “(I’ll be the ruler{Line} of this Garden someday!)”
Monologue.Original: “(I’ll be the ruler{Line} of this Garden someday!)”

Monologue.Current: “Wow.{Line} Amazing.{Line} I can’t believe you defeated Diamond.”{Next}“Yes, I am one of the 4-Suits of{Line} CC group, Card Knight Spade.”{Next}“It’s been a while since someone{Line} made it this far...”{Next}“Shall we start?{Line} As you already know, please{Line} press {Key Cards} to challenge me.”
Monologue.Original: “Wow.{Line} Amazing.{Line} I can’t believe you defeated Diamond.”{Next}“Yes, I am one of the 4-Suits of{Line} CC group, Card Knight Spade.”{Next}“It’s been a while since someone{Line} made it this far...”{Next}“Shall we start?{Line} As you already know, please{Line} press {Key Cards} to challenge me.”

Monologue.Current: Spade{Line}“Let’s play.”{Line}Yes{Line}No
Monologue.Original: Spade{Line}“Let’s play.”{Line}Yes{Line}No

Monologue.Current: You need 5 or more{Line}cards to play.
Monologue.Original: You need 5 or more{Line}cards to play.

Monologue.Current: Spade{Line}“Wow, you are good...{Line} I accept defeat.”{Next}“I can tell you’ve collected and played{Line} cards all over the world.”{Next}“And you remind me of her...{Line} Her talent, especially.”{Next}“Oh, now I’ve said too much.”{Next}“Well, there is one more suit{Line} for you to defeat. But Heart{Line} is no ordinary player.”{Next}“She became the top player of CC group{Line} in only 3 months. She is{Line} a true genius.”{Next}“You two seem to have a{Line} similar learning ability.”{Next}“Well, now that I have bored{Line} you with too much detail...”{Next}“I shall leave.{Line} So long.”
Monologue.Original: Spade{Line}“Wow, you are good...{Line} I accept defeat.”{Next}“I can tell you’ve collected and played{Line} cards all over the world.”{Next}“And you remind me of her...{Line} Her talent, especially.”{Next}“Oh, now I’ve said too much.”{Next}“Well, there is one more suit{Line} for you to defeat. But Heart{Line} is no ordinary player.”{Next}“She became the top player of CC group{Line} in only 3 months. She is{Line} a true genius.”{Next}“You two seem to have a{Line} similar learning ability.”{Next}“Well, now that I have bored{Line} you with too much detail...”{Next}“I shall leave.{Line} So long.”

Monologue.Current: “Please come by here anytime{Line} to play cards with me again.{Line} I’m always up for a good game.”{Next}“See you.”
Monologue.Original: “Please come by here anytime{Line} to play cards with me again.{Line} I’m always up for a good game.”{Next}“See you.”

Monologue.Current: Spade{Line}“Hello.{Line} If you’re not busy, how about a game?”
Monologue.Original: Spade{Line}“Hello.{Line} If you’re not busy, how about a game?”

Monologue.Current: Spade{Line}“I’m always up for a{Line} challenge.”
Monologue.Original: Spade{Line}“I’m always up for a{Line} challenge.”
